北爱中部的内伊湖（Lough Neagh）是全英国最大的淡水湖。拉根河谷和贝尔法斯特海湾两岸是北爱人口最稠密的地区。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Irish loch. The spelling lough survived in Ireland but the pronunciation was replaced by that of the Irish word

means.word_mean: 1. a long narrow (nearly landlocked) cove in Ireland
